results.name: Zombie Camera 3D Shooter - AR Zombie Game (lisaweby)
Aarimous's LD50 Port to Mobile Alpha

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel HD graphics
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Tested on Windows 10.
  • Graphics: Uses OpenGL 3.3. Supported Resolutions: 480p, 720p, 768p, 1080p.
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Should support any gamepad compatible with SDL2.
